verse.unicode: ਕਾਟਿ ਕੈ ਬਾਨ ਸਬੈ ਤਿਨ ਕੇ ਅਪੁਨੇ ਸਰ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਹਰਿ ਕੇ ਤਨ ਘਾਏ ॥

transliteration.english: s dhavai kai saya(n)dhan bhaaj chale ddar maan ghano ar teeran ko ||

en.bdb: They got their chariots driven and for the fear of the shower of arrows, they ran away and considered in their mind that Krishna has not acted sagaciously in taking up war with Kharag Singh.1442.
